title: 7 Acre Bare Land For Sale At Kalpitiya
details:
This is a 7 acre bare land about 500 meters from Kalpitiya main road and is located at Sethawadiya Kalpitiya.

Sethawadiya is one of the fastest developing areas in the Kalpitiya region with many well established hotels, resorts, restaurants and guest houses. The area is also famous for its Kalpitiya lagoon where kite surfing is done and the spot is considered a paradise for the kite surfing enthusiasts.

The land comes with white sand, green grass and wild thorn trees. There is consistent breeze from the beach that blows across the land. The land is located close to Divyaa boutique hotel in the region and only a few minutes to the beach and the kite lagoon.

Ideal location for a personal holiday bungalow or a tourism project.

Now available for immediate sale with-

- Clear Deed & Title (Sinnakkara)
- Electricity (less than 100 meters from the land)
- Good Road Access

Asking price is LKR 6.5Mln/Acre

If interested please contact us on 077 77 33 823 for further details.

Thanks For Looking :)
